data.trans: Tìm ra các phát hiện mới và quan trọng
data.trans_hint: Các nhà khoa học đang cố gắng đột phá trong giải pháp chống lại bệnh ung thư.
data.en_hint: Scientists are trying to break through in the solution against cancer.
data.content_game_1: Scientists are trying to break through in the solution against cancer.
data.answer_en_hint: Scientists are trying to break through in the solution against cancer.

data.trans_hint: Các bác sĩ không nghĩ rằng ông sẽ sống sót được qua đêm nay.
data.en_hint: The doctors don't think he will live through the night.
data.content_game_1: The doctors don't think he will live through the night.
data.answer_en_hint: The doctors don't think he will live through the night.

data.trans_hint: Bạn có thể soát lại bản báo cáo này trước khi tôi gửi nó cho sếp không?
data.en_hint: Can you look through this report before I hand it in to the boss?
data.content_game_1: Can you look through this report before I hand it in to the boss?
data.answer_en_hint: Can you look through this report before I hand it in to the boss?

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã dành cả buổi tối để soát lại luận án của mình.
data.en_hint: I spent the evening reading through my thesis.
data.content_game_1: I spent the evening reading through my thesis.
data.answer_en_hint: I spent the evening reading through my thesis.

data.trans: Nhận thấu bản chất, sự thật
data.trans_hint: Anh ta có thể nhìn thấu những lời nói dối và lừa lọc của cô.
data.en_hint: He can see through her lies and deceptions.
data.content_game_1: He can see through her lies and deceptions.
data.answer_en_hint: He can see through her lies and deceptions.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy có thể hoàn thành công việc trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn.
data.en_hint: She can get through a lot of work in a short amount of time.
data.content_game_1: She can get through a lot of work in a short amount of time.
data.answer_en_hint: She can get through a lot of work in a short amount of time.

data.trans_hint: Nắm rõ nhiệm vụ trước khi chúng ta bắt tay vào làm là điều rất quan trọng.
data.en_hint: It is important to see the task through before we get down to it.
data.content_game_1: It is important to see the task through before we get down to it.
data.answer_en_hint: It is important to see the task through before we get down to it.

data.trans: Giải thích cho ai đó về việc gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi cần nhờ một đồng nghiệp giải thích cho tôi về các chính sách của công ty.
data.en_hint: I need to ask a coworker to take me through the company policies.
data.content_game_1: I need to ask a coworker to take me through the company policies.
data.answer_en_hint: I need to ask a coworker to take me through the company policies.
